item.title: Are CIE Automotive India Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: CIE Automotive India Ltd's latest results show record revenue growth of 13.42% year-on-year, but profitability has declined, with operating margins under pressure due to rising costs. Overall, while revenue performance is strong, the company faces significant operational challenges. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Are ABB India Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: ABB India Ltd's latest Q3 FY26 results show strong revenue growth with record net sales of ₹3,557.01 crores, up 22.14% year-on-year, but profitability is under pressure, with a significant drop in operating margin to 15.63% and a slight decline in net profit. Overall, while revenue performance is robust, challenges in maintaining profitability raise concerns for future sustainability. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Are Sattva Sukun Lifecare Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Sattva Sukun Lifecare Ltd's latest Q3 FY26 results are concerning, showing a net loss of ₹0.69 crores and a 66.21% drop in revenue to ₹5.69 crores, indicating significant operational challenges and a shift from profitability to losses. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: ARCL Organics Ltd Forms Death Cross, Signalling Potential Bearish Trend
item.description: ARCL Organics Ltd, a micro-cap player in the Commodity Chemicals sector, has recently formed a Death Cross, a significant technical indicator where the 50-day moving average crosses below the 200-day moving average. This development signals a potential deterioration in the stock’s trend and raises concerns about sustained bearish momentum in the near to medium term. Time: 3 hours ago

item.title: Quarterly Earnings Review: Mixed Results Across 4,085 Stocks in Dec-2025 Quarter
item.description: The December 2025 quarter earnings season has concluded for 4,085 stocks, revealing a nuanced landscape of corporate performance marked by modest improvement in positive results and distinct sectoral trends. While aggregate profit growth remains subdued, mid-cap companies continue to outperform their large- and small-cap counterparts, underscoring a divergence in market dynamics heading into 2026. Time: 3 hours ago
